channel.title: CVE Feed for The libvirt Project -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The libvirt Project -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-3840|2024-08-04T19:19:18.580Z -- the%20libvirt%20project -- libvirt
item.description: A NULL pointer dereference flaw was discovered in libvirt before version 5.0.0 in the way it gets interface information through the QEMU agent. An attacker in a guest VM can use this flaw to crash libvirtd and cause a denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2019-3886|2024-08-04T19:19:18.727Z -- the%20libvirt%20project -- libvirt
item.description: An incorrect permissions check was discovered in libvirt 4.8.0 and above. The readonly permission was allowed to invoke APIs depending on the guest agent, which could lead to potentially disclosing unintended information or denial of service by causing libvirt to block.
